page.title: 16Flash Youth Club
page.content: Flash Youth Club meets at the Village Hall every Thursday from 7.00 p.m. till 10.00 p.m. You have to be 8 years old to join. We play football, badmintion, snooker, darts and we also play records. You have to pay 15p if you are a member and 20p if you are not. At Christmas we have pop quizes and bands. You have to pay for the toys when you want to play incase you break or loose something. There are roughly 20 members and 5 people who aren't members. You are not allowed to disturb the villagers and we are not allowed to go off the premises. You have to pay the money for the rent of the Village Hall and the central heating.
